item.title: EP 68 - Meth Immortality
item.itunes:title: Meth Immortality
item.description:
Today we look into the cosmos to see if a killer planet is headed our way, then we *sigh* explore whether or not crystal meth can make you immortal.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

"Hercolubus, or Red Planet" is a book from 1999 that reveals that a planet is headed our way. Can we avoid the doom by ascending to another dimension? Hand me that 6th huckleberry!

Then we examine the idea that crystal meth has health benefits (it doesn't) and if you can charge a meth crystal the same way you could infuse any other crystal. Yeah, it gets weird today.

Links:

Twilight Zone: I Of Newton

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BoQ6ZC8EUQ0

HERCOLUBUS, THE PLANET THAT IS APPROACHING

https://hercolubusplanet.com/

HERCOLUBUS: The Greatest Mystery Of The Modern Era

http://cosmicconvergence.org/?p=4877

Review of Hercólubus or Red Planet by V.M. Rabolú

http://debunkatron.com/reviews/Hercolubus_or_Red_Planet_by_V.M._Rabolu.html

Hercolubus

http://www.2012prophecys.com/hercolubus.php

The Really Big One

https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2015/07/20/the-really-big-one?irgwc=1&source=affiliate_impactpmx_12f6tote_desktop_FlexOffers.com%2C%20LLC&mbid=affiliate_impactpmx_12f6tote_desktop_FlexOffers.com%2C%20LLC

1700 Cascadia earthquake

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1700_Cascadia_earthquake

Meth Immortality

https://archive.4plebs.org/x/thread/20266616/

Meth Immortality

https://archive.4plebs.org/x/thread/19467205/

Mythbusters: Is meth really all that bad for you?

https://www.drugfoundation.org.nz/matters-of-substance/february-2012/mythbusters/

What is/are the benefits of using meth?

https://www.quora.com/What-is-are-the-benefits-of-using-meth

Are there any benefits to meth?

https://www.quora.com/Are-there-any-benefits-to-meth

How to Charge Crystals for Healing

https://www.wikihow.com/Charge-Crystals-for-Healing

How To Charge Crystals and Stones?

https://meanings.crystalsandjewelry.com/charge-crystals-and-stones/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
